channel.title: Comments on: Tuesday Newsday: Pay walls, Freemium, Business Class â€“ What Works?

item.title: By: Greg Golebiewski
item.dc:creator: Greg Golebiewski
item.description:
A good coverage. However, the paywall model is outdated (some say it was created to save print and belongs to the mostly print era). Online users want choice and freedom to pay as they surf the net, one article at a time, from many different publishers.
Check Znak it! if you want a better content monetization system.
item.content:encoded:
A good coverage. However, the paywall model is outdated (some say it was created to save print and belongs to the mostly print era). Online users want choice and freedom to pay as they surf the net, one article at a time, from many different publishers.

Check Znak it! if you want a better content monetization system.
